title: Spicy winter vegetable soup
ingredients: ['1 parsnip, peeled and cut into large chunks', '2 carrots, peeled and cut into large chunks', '1 sweet potato, peeled and cut into large chunks', '1/2 turnip, peeled and cut into large chunks', '2 cubes vegetable stock', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic', '100ml double cream', 'olive oil', 'cayenne pepper to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'dried mixed herbs to taste', 'chilli powder to taste']
